main.name: Nobuhiro Ueda
main.description: I am a researcher at the Data Science Laboratory, NEC Corporation. I received my Ph.D. in Informatics. I am working on R&D of large language models and natural language processing.

education.school: Graduate School of Informatics, Kyoto University
education.description: Worked on research about natural language processing.
